pageContext.claim: “I think the responsibility is the people that have run Baltimore for so many years, obviously headed up by Elijah Cummings. They've run Baltimore into the ground. We've given billions and billions of dollars to Baltimore.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump simply made up claims here. Records tracked by The Baltimore Sun show that over the past two years, city government got $380 million in federal aid — far less than $1 billion.
